title: Yubisaki kara no Honki no Netsujou 2: Osananajimi wa Shouboushi
synopsis: Following the first season, Ryou and Souma—who revealed their feelings for each other—have finally started dating. When they thought their hearts and bodies were more deeply connected during their lovey dovey days, her ex-boyfriend Rei came to where they work. The three are reminded of their school days when their feelings grew apart. Ryou doesn't want to get involved, but he ends up teaming up with Rei. (Source: MAL News)

details.Synonyms: Fire From My Fingertips 2: My Lover is a Firefighter
details.Japanese: 指先から本気の熱情 2-恋人は消防士-

title: Liyuanba Biezhuan
synopsis: It comes from the Romance of Li Xuanba, the third son of the historical figure Tang Gaozu Li Yuan, but completely deviates from historical facts. He was the first hero in the Sui and Tang Dynasties. "He was twelve years old and he was born with a sharp mouth with a narrow cheek and a yellow hair in the middle. Wearing a black gold crown, his face is like a sick ghost; his bones are as thin as wood and his strength is infinite. But bravery, twisted iron like mud, better than Han Dynasty Xiang Yu. A meal of rice, eating ten catties of meat. Use two hammers, four hundred catties each, two handles total 800 catties, like a cylinder. Sit for a thousand miles. Cloud, the world is invincible.” At that time, almost no one could walk three rounds in front of Li Yuanba's horse. It can be said that Zhao Wang Li Yuanba fought the world invincible. Siming Mountain Li Yuanba defeated the 230,000 anti-king army; successively killed famous generals Wu Tianxi and Yuwen Chengdu, and faced more than one million troops at Zijin Mountain. A pair of golden hammers were like flies. Li Mi surrendered the Yuxi, and the anti-king presented the watch. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Shaonian Wangyangming
synopsis: Relying on the life and historical records of the great man Wang Yangming, while respecting historical facts, he developed rich imagination and re-portrayed Wang Yangming's boyhood from birth to 16 years old. Zheng (Mother of Yangming) was pregnant for more than ten months, and his grandfather dreamed of giving off a child in a cloud. Later, he gave birth and named him Wang Yun. However, Wang Yunshao couldn't say that when he was five years old, he was broken by a high monk. It was because his name broke the secret of heaven. Later he changed his name to Wang Shouren. Since childhood, he is clever and clever, and his exports are chapters, but his heart is not above the merits of being an official and government. He likes to read military books and wants to contribute to the country. At a young age, he has martial arts skills, both civil and military, and aspires to be a saint.(translated from bilibili)

title: Lanting Xiao Jingling
synopsis: The story tells the legend that when the book sage Wang Xizhi of the Eastern Jin Dynasty was in the Orchid Pavilion, the brush and ink thrown by the drunken writing "Orchid Pavilion Preface" turned into elves. This is China's first animation work that uses strokes of Chinese characters as characters to create stories. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Wan Pi
synopsis: Xiaowanpi is a child who grew up in space. His parents work in alien systems all year round. On his birthday in the summer vacation, the parents who couldn't come back to Xiaowan Pi Qingsheng sent him a magical gift-super clothes. The Xiaowanpi wearing a super suit can use the password change function to create all kinds of high-tech props that only exist in his mind. Xiaowanpi decided to use the summer time to embark on the road of interstellar travel alone, without telling his family, to give his father a birthday gift made by himself. During this interstellar journey, Xiao Wanpi encountered a lot of people who came to snatch the super clothes, but fortunately many alien friends gathered around him. With the concerted efforts of his partners, he finally arrived safely at Zolma Star, met his long-lost parents, and the bad guys were caught and sent to prison. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tantan Xiao Dongyuan
synopsis: This film tells about a beautiful house on a distant planet. There are many strange toys in the house. The baby tanks in the toy will play happily together when the little master is not at home. Some of them are kind, some are evil, some are smart, some are humorous. The tanks of the justice camp and the prank camp will always chase and play for a variety of reasons, and have a lot of fun, thus staged a series of hilarious, intriguing, vivid and interesting stories. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Gongfu Jiazu Zhi Ben Ben Shu
synopsis: Stupid Mouse is an optimistic wise and foolish, no matter what the world is, he can always find happiness. Fighting Bear is a big body and careful self-righteous guy who takes pleasure in bullying simple-minded rats. Xinxintu is a little girl who loves fantasies, loves to act like a baby and loves all pink things, and she is also the girl who cares most about dumb rat. Fighting Bear always cares about Xinxintu's attitude towards the dumb mouse. As long as Xinxintu takes a look at the dumb mouse and smiles more, it will make the anti-fight bear jealous and use all kinds of tricks to please Xinxintu , Use various means to make the dumb mouse unlucky. But in the end, the wise and stupid rat can always turn a good fortune, but the deliberate anti-fighting bear is self-defeating everywhere. Four characters who are also friends and enemies staged joyful stories that make people laugh. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yuanlai Shi Zheyang
synopsis: Xiaowai and Chacha are good friends who love science. With the help of the doctor, they and their friends did a series of experiments to explore the mysteries of the universe. Of course, in the process of exploring the secrets, there are also various ridiculous episodes. I believe that in this cartoon, children can not only get entertainment, but also gain knowledge!(translated from tenceng)

title: Taiji Kedou Chengzhang Ji Zhi Baishi Xi Wu Pian
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 太极蝌蚪成长记之拜师习武篇

title: Chaoji Pi Pi Ke
synopsis: In the valley town, there lived Little Fox and Pipik and his friends-Dali, Kerry, Buji and Jeffery. Like many young boys, Pipik is naughty, smart, loves to listen to stories, loves fantasy, and fantasizes about becoming a super hero. Save the earth, save the universe, these earth-shaking ideals are full of this little boy's mind. During this holiday when Mom and Dad went to travel, a magical thing happened (translated from youku)

title: Songshan Qi Yuan
synopsis: Four children from different places, Xiaodi, Xiaoyue, Xiaoxin, and Dalong, met in Songshan and became good friends in order to learn martial arts. Their martial arts instructor, Pan Yong, keeps the pearl "Yue", a treasure with divine power. Good people can benefit the world if they get it, while evil people can do harm to the whole world if they get it. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Jingling Ai Ya Jiangtang
synopsis: Elf Love Tooth Lecture-The oral health knowledge video mainly tells about the oral health knowledge of the Elf and Dr. Tooth to help patients with oral diseases relieve the pain and torture. The story is mainly relaxed and humorous, and cleverly integrates the knowledge and common sense of oral health. It tells that when patients with various oral diseases come to the dental hospital, they can treat and understand the daily life of oral health care knowledge through interaction with the protagonist of the film, the tooth fairy. story. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Jingling Ai Ya Jiangtang Zhi Kouqiang Jiankang Zhishi
synopsis: Elf Love Tooth Lecture-The oral health knowledge video mainly tells about the oral health knowledge of the Elf and Dr. Tooth to help patients with oral diseases relieve the pain and torture. The story is mainly relaxed and humorous, and cleverly integrates the knowledge and common sense of oral health. It tells that when patients with various oral diseases come to the dental hospital, they can treat and understand the daily life of oral health care knowledge through interaction with the protagonist of the film, the tooth fairy. story. (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 精灵爱牙讲堂之口腔健康知识

title: Yaya Jingling Zhandui
synopsis: This animation takes the Yaya Elf captain as the protagonist. The four players with different functions and personalities in the Yaya Elf team established make the story more full. Abandon the traditional form of popular science deduction and anthropomorphize all dental diseases into cartoon monsters with characters and destructive skills. Through the destructive deduction of germs, the root causes of various oral diseases are explained. His humorous and funny performances will turn complicated into simple, break the barriers to understanding oral pathology, and reform the dullness caused by obscure text. The humorous nature of animation is used to present the relationship between oral medicine and health, making it a fashion for the public to understand, learn, invest and value oral cavity. (translated from tenceng)

title: Bei Wa Xue Yingyu Hai Xiao Qiche
synopsis: Bewa Learn English: Hi, Car" is a children's cognitive animation designed and produced for babies between 0 and 3 years old. The little beaver will have a series of interesting stories with the transportation: the excavator helps him build the castle; the road sweeper teaches him not to litter; the crane completes the Christmas tree with him; the helicopter takes him to the sky... Come and learn about the appearance, functions and words of various vehicles with the little beaver (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 贝瓦学英语 嗨 小汽车

title: Bei Wa Xue Zhongwen Hai Xiao Dongwu
synopsis: "Bewa Learn Chinese: Hi, Little Animals" is a children's cognitive animation designed and produced for babies between 0 and 3 years old. Through simple and interesting scenes, exaggerated and vivid character animations, the interaction between the narration and the protagonist little beaver is used to guide the baby to recognize things. This season, the little beaver will have a series of interesting stories with the little animals: he helped the sloth cross the road, the banana was stolen by the naughty little monkey, the elephant used his nose to help the little beaver bath... Come and join the little beaver Learn about the appearance of various small animals! (translated form iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 贝瓦学中文 嗨 小动物

title: Xiaohe Li Bei Wa
synopsis: The story takes place in a modern living community—the Beaver Community. The little Beaver Bewa and his good friends Bella, Be Dudu, Becaka, and Red Fox Pique all live here. They are both neighbors and kindergarten friends. By showing a series of happy stories that happened in daily life of Bewa and friends, guide children to establish a basic sense of social rules, cultivate good personal cultivation, and let children grow into a love of life, excellent character, and character with Bewa's company. Excellent young citizens with ethics and self-control. (translated from youku)

title: Bei Wa Gushi
synopsis: Bewa is a happy little beaver and the most intimate partner of the children. It is cheerful and lively by nature, and likes to explore the unknown. Hardworking and courageous, with a strong sense of justice, and likes to help others. I am imaginative, trying to realize all kinds of wonderful ideas in my head. When dealing with difficulties, I will not shrink back and go forward courageously. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bei Wa Qimeng Yingwen Yanse
synopsis: "Bewa Enlightenment-English Color" is a set of bilingual cognitive cartoons designed and produced for babies from 1 to 4 years old. In each episode of 3 minutes, the little beaver Bewa and his friends will lead the babies through the colorful world of colors. In the creative animation plot, they will observe colors, recognize colors, and learn English words repeatedly. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 贝瓦启蒙 英文颜色

title: Bei Wa Xingwei Xiguan Yang Cheng
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Yi Tang Xiao Gushi
synopsis: The film uses animation techniques to interpret the colorful and colorful historical short stories of our country, such as Qi Huan Public People Dou Dou, Liu Bei San Gu Maolu, Su Qin Xuanliang Stabbing Stock, Kuang Heng Chiseling Wall and Borrowing Light, etc., to convey to the audience the principles of hard work, trust and cooperation, etc. to deal with people.(translated from bilibili)

title: Du Du Xiao Bashi Zhi Ciyu Chengbao
synopsis: There are 80 episodes of the animated series "Dudu Bus: Word Castle", each episode is 6.5 minutes, two-dimensional animation production. This film uses three cute, clever and beautiful protagonists as clues to tell what they have seen and heard about riding the tuk tuk bus, combining the knowledge necessary for children's growth, so that small audiences can not only enjoy the fun The story and lovely pictures can also expand knowledge and grow up healthy in happiness. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 嘟嘟小巴士之词语城堡

title: Du Du Xiao Bashi Zhi Jiankang Pian
synopsis: There are 80 episodes in the upper part of "The Healthy Growth of Tudu Bus". The theme is children’s health. The three protagonists take a tuk tuk bus and pass by the "Science Hall", "Science Castle", "Happy Theater", and other places along the way. They not only get to know their own body, but also understand the importance of health and know what can't be done. Do, what dangers should be avoided, let the children know how to protect themselves and spend every day of their growth healthy and healthy.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Du Du Xiao Bashi Zhi Hanzi Chengbao
synopsis: The animated series "Dudu School of Chinese Characters Castle" has 80 episodes, each episode is 6.5 minutes, two-dimensional animation production. This film uses three cute, clever and beautiful protagonists as clues to tell what they have seen and heard about riding the tuk tuk bus, combining the knowledge necessary for children's growth, so that small audiences can not only enjoy the fun The story and lovely pictures can also expand knowledge and grow up healthy in happiness.(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 嘟嘟小巴士之汉字城堡

title: Du Du Xiao Bashi Zhi Shuxue Chengbao
synopsis: The animated series "The Mathematics Castle of Tudu Bus" has 80 episodes, each episode is 6.5 minutes, two-dimensional animation production. This film uses three cute, clever and beautiful protagonists as clues to tell what they have seen and heard about riding the tuk tuk bus, combining the knowledge necessary for children's growth, so that small audiences can not only enjoy the fun The story, lovely pictures, and at the same time expand the knowledge, grow up healthy in happiness (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 嘟嘟小巴士之数学城堡

title: Du Du Xiao Bashi Zhi Cheng Chang Pian
synopsis: There are 80 episodes in the lower part of "The Healthy Growth of Tudu Bus". The theme is children's psychological education and character training. Dudu minibus passes through the "Happy Valley", "Growth Paradise" and other places along the way. Through a variety of wonderful experiences, the three friends have become more brave, confident, and caring. They also know selfishness, cowardice, etc. It's a bad thing, and you need to work hard to overcome it so that you can become a good boy that everyone loves. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Nushen De Sheng Dou Shi
synopsis: The Tang Shui Three Kingdoms No Morality Interest Group said that the Three Kingdoms can no longer satisfy us. Let’s talk about the jokes of the Saints this time. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ba Bu Dou
synopsis: Elementary school student Babudou just entered the third grade, and found that the relationship between himself and his parents, brothers and feet, teachers, and classmates is completely different from that of first and second grades. Unexpectedly, there is a big secret hidden in the big oak tree on Oak Square. Babudou has experienced a series of witty, warm and loving stories together with his good friends Cherry, Little Dot, and Little Pepper. (translated from youku)

title: Da Jing Xiao Guai
synopsis: Each episode of "Da Jing Xiaoguai" is composed of an independent short story, 1 episode 15 minutes, and a total of 6 episodes in the first season. It tells the story of a group of young people living in Beijing. It incorporates elements such as youth, fashion, city, and funny, and includes topics such as family affection, friendship, love, career, money, etc. The life and thoughts of the 80s and 90s are expressed in a humorous and grotesque way, bringing joy and happiness to the audience. Elicit thinking and can arouse strong resonance from the audience. When you can find it from "Dajing Mobs" (translated from baidu)

title: Jiutian Shenhua
synopsis: The Nine Heavens Myth Animation Version is an original domestic animation born out of the Xishanju online game "Nine Heavens Myth". Its content is all based on Chinese mythology, with bold and novel creativity, funny and humorous performance techniques, a new interpretation of the content of Chinese traditional mythology. The Chinese mythology that has been regarded as outdated and old-fashioned is brought back to everyone, hoping to arouse some new understanding of traditional mythology. This is the initial starting point and core idea of this animation. The animated version of Nine Heavens Mythology is composed of many different mythological short stories. There is no direct connection between each other but the characters will cross the scenes. This is also a feature of Chinese mythology.(translated from youku)

title: Mengjiangnu(2013)
synopsis: Meng Jiangnu is a figure in Chinese folklore, and her character story is one of the four major love stories among Chinese folk. For thousands of years, it has been widely spread among the folks in the form of oral inheritance. The earliest legend can be traced back to "Zuo Zhuan". (translated from iqiyi)

title: Mengjiangnu(2018)
synopsis: Two thousand years ago, Mengjiayuan Village, Tongchuan City, Shaanxi Province lived in two families, Uncle Meng and Aunt Jiang. Both of them were alone, without children. For saving the golden swallow, the Virgin gave them a golden gourd seed. After the gourd seeds grew up, a female doll popped out of it, namely Meng Jiangnu. Before she knew it, Meng Jiangnu grew up and married her childhood sweetheart Fan Xiliang. After three days of marriage, Fan Xiliang was taken away by Zhao Gao's men to build the Great Wall. Meng Jiangnv traveled a long distance to find Fan Xiliang, and when she learned that Fan Xiliang was buried in the Great Wall, she cried down a corner of the Great Wall. Zhao Gao sent people to arrest Meng Jiangnv. Although Meng Jiangnv escaped Zhao Gao's persecution, she eventually passed away. Meng Jiangnv and Fan Xiliang were among the immortal class.(translated from douban)

title: Choco-matsu-san: Valentine's Day-hen
synopsis: Chocomasu-san Valentine-hen on February 13-15, 2021 Chocomatsu-san White Day-hen on March 2021

details.Japanese: チョコ松さん～バレンタインデー編～

title: Zhongwai Mingren Chengzhang Gushi
synopsis: Since ancient times, heroes have grown up, and young heroes have suffered more." Every celebrity’s success has experienced a difficult journey of struggle. Our purpose of writing this book is to let readers understand the growth story of celebrities, and more importantly, through Reading this book allows readers to see the perseverance, courage and perseverance of celebrities. Of course, celebrities do not mean smart people. They are not gods. They also have shortcomings of one kind or another. We should Take a warning. The selection of Chinese and foreign celebrities’ success stories selects the stories of Chinese and foreign celebrities, so that readers can grasp the historical development process and have a deeper understanding of the major historical events and stories that occurred during the growth of celebrities, so as to achieve understanding and learning The purpose of celebrities.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Zi Xiao Chu Shen
synopsis: Xingzai, a young chef from Xingxing Village, learned to cook with his grandfather since he was a child. After his grandfather passed away, Xingzai inherited his grandfather's Huicai Building. Ding Jiu, who just wants to make money, covets Huicailou. In order to keep the restaurant and realize his dream of becoming the greatest chef, Xingzai keeps improving his cooking skills, growing up in challenges and competitions from all sides, not only has he repeatedly defeated Ding Jiu’s conspiracy. , And made many like-minded chef friends in the challenge. After going through hardships and obstacles, Xingzai finally passed the assessment and won the title of Chinese Little Chef God. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tu Boshi Yu Xiaojin Dou
synopsis: In the forest community, Dr. Rabbit, Xiao Jindou and his friends live. On the way of financial management, they often worry about all kinds of things, how to spend their pocket money? How to save, how to spend money, how to shop, how to invest, how to create more wealth, etc., but at the same time they also gain The most important dreams in life: wealth, wisdom, freedom and happiness! This film is the first cartoon for children's financial quotient education in China. Through financial quotient education and training and improving children's financial quotient, IQ and emotional quotient, children can learn better management Own life. "Dr. Rabbit" can answer all the troubles in life due to money. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Qipaoxian Chengyu Gushi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Peng Peng Huan Youji
synopsis: In the boundless sky, stars twinkled. A small eagle, Kaka, sent from an alien to the earth to find the nuclear button lost in Country B, drifted through the night sky and fell into Pengpeng's house. It turned out that Kakaying was a Martian policeman who accidentally caught fire on the way to Earth. Kaka Eagle saw the beautiful side of the earth, and at the same time saw the reality of human war on the earth. He is determined to help mankind find the nuclear button lost in country B and change the bad things that mankind fights with each other. However, there is a flying fox from an alien planet who also wants to get a nuclear button to realize his dream of ruling the world. Threaten Li lure Pengpeng, Kakaying and others everywhere, and confront them everywhere. In the process of traveling around the world, Pengpeng, Kaka and Flying Fox battled wits and courage, and experienced many life and death struggles. From the ancient Egyptian pyramid tombs to the dangers of the charming fantasy fairyland, the life and death contest over the city of peace, after some fierce struggle, justice finally defeated evil. Kakaying found the nuclear button lost in country B and eliminated the terrorists on the earth. Kakaying and Pengpeng won.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Taigong Qi Shu
synopsis: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Xiaotian, a little boy in Yingzhou City, picked up a scroll with many amazing secrets hidden in it. An old white-bearded man named Taigong found Xiaotian and told him that the city was facing a crisis. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ju Neng Zi
synopsis: The animation is based on Xinjiang's magnificent historical pictures and beautiful scenery. The protagonist in the film, Nono, is a timid and shy primary school student, who likes to watch science fiction fairy tales and fantasizes about being a brave and invincible little hero. With the advancement of the story of the film, he has become strong and courageous through continuous experience, and he has enriched his knowledge of geography and humanities in each journey, bringing more Xinjiang historical and cultural stories to the audience, and making the hero in the film brave. , Tolerance, honesty, unity, self-confidence, dedication, love and other qualities spread to the majority of young friends. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Hei Dou Mu Zi Qiyu Ji
synopsis: Hei Dou, a young boy in ancient times, met Zhang Sengyou, a great painter in the Southern Dynasties, and got the finishing touch. The finishing pen can make the drawing come true, but it can only last for 5 minutes. Hei Dou came to the modern era with a finishing touch. He became friends with the boy Mu Tsai and moved into Mu Tsai's house. Black tea loves to eat, Mu Tsai is timid, and with a magical finishing touch, the two boys often make trouble making people laugh and cry.

title: Xiao Fan Gongzuo Ji
synopsis: After graduating, Xiao Fan rented an apartment with his good alumni Xiaopang, Glasses, Lin Feng, Dai Yu and Annie, and began to work hard. The friends have experienced ups and downs, joy, anger, sorrow, and joy. They have a kind heart, love life, but are also witty and humorous. They often say funny things and do unexpected things. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Mu Mu Xiong Huanqiu Tansuo
synopsis: Wood bears explore the infinite mysteries of nature, from mysterious virgin forests to deep underwater worlds, snow-capped mountains, grasslands, polar regions, and the vast universe. In the process of exploration, the wooden bear can always use wit and bravery to turn dangers to end, and finally complete the journey of wisdom and courage.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Dou Dou Yuzhou Da Maoxian
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Tulou Tanxian Zhi Niuniu He Niuniu
synopsis: Niu Lang brought two children, Niuniu and Niuniu, and Zhinv to meet at Queqiao, and the naughty Niuniu fell into the world. In order to find her sister, Niuniu came to the Tulou in Yongding to find Niuniu under the guidance of Taibai Jinxing, but Niuniu found that her sister had lost her memory, and the guardian deity Xiangyun in her sister disappeared. The evil night demon and his mice took away Xiangyun. With the help of Tulou friends, Niuniu restored Niuniu's memory and finally defeated the Night Demon. With the help of everyone, Niuniu and Niuniu found the way to heaven and went home. (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 土楼探险之牛牛和妞妞

title: Xing Da Donghua Xilie Zhi Shuguo Leyuan
synopsis: Star Cat summons Shining and her friends to make a return visit to the insect kingdom. However, the mischievous thickness broke the navigation system of the spacecraft. The spacecraft driven by Star Cat accidentally broke into a new and mysterious world, and was stopped by a group of chubby orange soldiers and taken to the palace of the paradise. The new King Kiwi disappeared on the day he took office, the paradise was in chaos, and Star Cat and others were treated as intruders and kidnappers. After learning about the adventures of Star Cat and his friends in the insect kingdom, the elders begged Star Cat to help them find the missing king. Star Cat and his party encountered many difficulties and dangers, saw all kinds of vegetables and fruits, and learned a lot of unknown knowledge about vegetables and fruits. Mrs. Butterfly gave them great help and confirmed that the kidnappers were locusts. With the help of Star Cat and his friends, the fruit residents successfully defeated the locust and rescued the kiwi king. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 星达动画系列之蔬果乐园

title: Tongzi Chuanqi
synopsis: In order to spread auspiciousness and love to the world, the naughty and cute boy and the ice-snow and smart little dragon girl are entrusted by the Guanyin Bodhisattva to start a magical journey. On Zhaocai Island, the boy took over the three-legged Jin Chan's money and met Zhong Kui who came to catch the ghost. A series of stories revolved around the boy and his friends. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tongzi Chuanqi Zhi Jixiang Zhongguo
synopsis: It mainly tells many interesting stories that happened on Zhaocai Island. In order to pass on the auspiciousness and love to the world, the naughty and lovely Lucky Boy and the Bingxue and Smart Little Dragon Girl are entrusted by the Guanyin Bodhisattva to embark on a magical journey. On Zhaocai Island, the boy took over the three-legged Jin Chan Qianqian and met Zhong Kuikui who came to catch the ghost. A series of stories revolved around Zhaocai Boy and his friends. The characters in the play are set such as the boy who recruits fortune, Zhong Kui who exorcises evil, the elder of Fucheng who blesses, and the compassionate Guanyin... all of them convey auspicious images and give people joyful dreams. "The Boy" creates a sense of auspiciousness and happiness. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tongzi Chuanqi Zhi Da Nao Zhao Cai Dao
synopsis: In order to pass on the auspiciousness and love to the world, the naughty and cute Lucky Boy Duoduo and the Bingxue Smart Little Dragon Girl are entrusted by the Guanyin Bodhisattva to start their magical journey. Many interesting stories happened on Zhaocai Island. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 童子传奇之大闹招财岛

title: Tongzi Chuanqi Zhi Zhao Cai Dao Zongdongyuan
synopsis: The Lucky Boy series mainly tells many interesting stories that happened on Zhaocai Island. In order to pass on the auspiciousness and love to the world, the naughty and lovely Lucky Boy and the Bingxue and Smart Little Dragon Girl are entrusted by the Guanyin Bodhisattva to embark on a magical journey. On Zhaocai Island, the boy took over the three-legged Jin Chan Qianqian, and met Brother Zhong Kuikui who came to catch the ghost. A series of stories revolved around Zhaocai Boy and his friends. Lucky blessings and joyous dreams are all in the lucky boy (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 童子传奇之招财岛总动员

title: Xiao Zhu Wai Wai
synopsis: Tudou and Waiwai are both students in Xiaozhu School. Tudou’s family is poor, but he has cultivated the habit of being positive and hardworking since childhood. Yiyai pampers herself and feels that everything can be solved with money. The two little pigs have many meaningful stories in life, study and social interaction. (translated from youku)

title: Dan Baobao Riji
synopsis: Dan Bao, Round and Pointy Run are three good friends in "Like City". Dan Bao is three years old, ignorant and cute. Jianjian is four years old, a little lively but a little careless. Kuanyuan is five years old, dull and lazy. The three people like to find some strange toys, cards, game props, etc. in the city every day, through these to understand and learn new knowledge. " (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tegong Tu Zhi Xin De Maoxian
synopsis: The agent rabbits embarked on a journey to save the rabbit planet. In order to deal with the powerful black division, the agent rabbits went through various adventures, and finally obtained the hell pearl which is said to be able to defeat the black division. In fact, the real gain is the tremendous progress made by the agents in the process of searching for treasures. (translated from tenceng)

title: Tegong Tu Zhi Shenmi De Wangzhan
synopsis: The peace of the global village is broken once again! Strange websites, disappeared residents, strange things appear one after another. The agent rabbits went deep into the tiger's den and took the risk to find the nest of the "Mie" organization. How to defeat the "destruction" without hurting the children has become a problem. Agent Rabbit brought the light in the hearts of the children together, exuding unprecedented energy.(translated from tenceng)

title: Tuzi Moli
synopsis: Rabbit Jasmine traveled in a hot air balloon and came to Sun Village. There, Jasmine and her friends experienced listening to insect sounds, growing teeth, driving monsters, building houses, etc., which added a lot of fun to everyone's lives and learned a lot from the partners. (tranalsted from tenceng)

title: Yi Tang Piyingxi Sunzi Bingfa
synopsis: Chinese art of war has been talked about by military strategists of all generations. Behind every strategy lies an amazing story. This film analyzes Sun Tzu's art of war in the form of shadow puppets, focusing on showing amazing military ingenuity and wisdom in life. Let the children appreciate the mysteries in the art of war and enlighten their thinking. (translated from bilibili)

title: Yu Liuli
synopsis: The film focuses on the healthy growth of left-behind children. It tells the story of the left-behind children Yijing, Xiaobao, Tiejun, Zhihao, Xiuxiu, and their friends in Niujiaogou Village. Under the care of "children", unity and mutual assistance, self-reliance, study hard and live happily are wonderful stories to realize their wishes. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Caise Dou Yuan
synopsis: All residents of Doudou City are the seeds of various beans and plants. Soybean Yoyo, Red Bean Dudu, Mung Bean Yoyo, and Black Bean Huhu form a group of beans. In order to defend their homeland, Doudou regiment and the three Chong brothers fought wit and courage, and finally thwarted their conspiracy. ()traslated from iqiyi

title: Xingxing Muchang Zhi Ban Ni Chengzhang
synopsis: The Star Ranch is a joyous and noisy place, with a group of happy animal friends. The clever little hamster Ding Ding, the cute little rabbit heart, the simple and honest Panda Panda, and the lion Peng Peng and other small animals help each other. Uncle Frog helps the timid Fat Da find courage, Xiao Lu helps the forgetful Uncle Frog recite the ninety-nine multiplication table, Ding Ding treats the scarecrow, and Pipi retrieves the swing for Ding Ding. The Star Ranch records every bit of love.(translated from bilibili)

title: Xingxing Muchang Zhi Mengxiang De Liliang
synopsis: A group of happy animal friends live in the Star Ranch: the clever little hamster Dingding, the cute little rabbit heart, the simple and honest Panda Panda, and the lion Peng Peng and other small animals. They unite, help each other, and love each other. In order to make the Star Ranch more beautiful, they work hard every day: maintaining the forest trees, taking care of the injured birds, and fulfilling the careful wishes of their companions. With their efforts, the Star Ranch has become more and more beautiful. (translated from bilibili)

By accident, they accidentally entered another fantasy space in the library. They wanted to go home, but found that this colorful world was full of strange monsters. (translated from youku)

title: Onyx Equinox
synopsis: The gods are at war for the future of humanity, and an Aztec boy named Izel finds himself caught in the middle of their dangerous game. In order to save humankind, he must complete an impossible task--closing the five gates to the underworld. Izel reluctantly agrees, but only after learning his quest will also correct a terrible tragedy. His journey to become humanity’s champion will be one of hope and despair, of trust and betrayal, where Izel must confront his own darkness and decide if the human race--with all its flaws and contradictions--is worth saving.

title: Long Qishi Chuanqi
synopsis: Specially designed for preschool children aged 3-6. The main story is 30 episodes, the extra story is 7 episodes, and there are 37 episodes in total. It is the first interactive pinyin learning cartoon in China, which can help children quickly master initials, vowels, complex vowels and 16 overall recognitions. Reading syllables and comprehensive spelling training. Fantasy stories, exquisite scenes and interesting animations that attract children. There are talking owls, magical five-color crystal stones, magnificent castles, magic wizards, ancient holy dragons-Reyas... Harry will become a justice warrior, learn magic in the kingdom of wisdom, collect spelling magic balls, and The partners will take an adventure together, and eventually defeat the Demon King Crook and save the entire magical world.(translated from iqiyi)
